channel.title: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]
channel.description:
Im not sure if this is possible for Project insanity but how do i make an NPC teleport you to XXXX YYYY when you kill them?
Please Help me adding a simple minigame ;D

item.title: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]
item.dc:creator: @dvp999 dvp999
item.description:
@dvp999 wrote:

um i guess lol i really wanted a pi 1…

item.source: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]

item.title: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

This is basic stuff, without the NpcDead method there isn’t much you can do.

if NPC == 1 && NpcDead(true) {
This just looks too see if the specific NPC Id has been killed, if it has been killed it will apply true and follow the rest of the code.

super(entity, location, 714, 715, Graphic.create(308, 46, 100), Graphic.create(-1), 4); getAnimation(); getDelay(); }
This is just a teleport, it then requests and fetches the animation and delay of teleporting.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]

is it open source? are there any unusual files missing i downloaded a pi and it had npchandler.java maybe its just your source

Saphhire since i am a begginner coder im looking at your code saying WTF

item.source: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]

item.title: [PI] Npc teleport you when you kill them [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Give you a little hint, although I highly doubt it will work on your server but it works on my hyperion project as I’ve got the correct methods ect.

if NPC == 1 && NpcDead(true) { super(entity, location, 714, 715, Graphic.create(308, 46, 100), Graphic.create(-1), 4); getAnimation(); getDelay(); }

This won’t work for your server, although you can look at it and see what needs too be done. Edit it too your needs and you may need too work out the Npcdead method yourself.

Read full topic
